data.title: Archipelago of Maddalena
data.meta_description: An archipelago of six islands: La Maddalena, Caprera, Santo Stefano, Spargi, Budelli, Santa Maria e Razzoli.
data.text:
Archipelago della Maddalena

An archipelago of six islands: La Maddalena, Caprera, Santo Stefano, Spargi, Budelli, Santa Maria e Razzoli.

The city of La Maddalena dating from the seventeenth century, is built on the main island looking onto Palau.

Famous and fascinating tourist spot with numerous beaches on its territory such as "The Pink Beach" on the Island of Budelli, part of the National Park.

Maddalena sailing the waters is a continuous new discovery of extraordinary landscapes of granite rocks and transparent waters.

La Maddalena is thus called âThe Land of Sailingâ, a top destination for sailors from around the world and a stop of the Louis Vuitton Trophy.

Palau is well connected to the islands all year round.
